author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Automotive Holdings Says ‍HY ‍Net Profit Attributable Down 2.4% To $39.9 Million​​
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Automotive Holdings Group Ltd:
* ‍HY REVENUES FROM CONTINUING ORDINARY ACTIVITIES UP 7.5% TO $2.87 BILLION ​
* INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 9.5 CENTS PER SHARE‍​ * HY ‍NET PROFIT AFTER TAX FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS ATTRIBUTABLE DOWN 2.4% TO $39.9 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
